SELECT A.THEMAMAP_CL_CODE, B.CODE_NM AS THEMAMAP_CL, A.THEMAMAP_NM, A.LAYER_NM, A.THEMAMAP_DECI, A.USE_AT FROM TBD_THEMAMAP AS A LEFT JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE AS B ON A.THEMAMAP_CL_CODE = B.CODE AND B.CODE_ID = 'TMC' WHERE A.USE_AT = 'Y'
AND B.CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%') OR A.THEMAMAP_NM LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
ORDER BY A.THEMAMAP_CL_CODE ASC, A.THEMAMAP_NM ASC
SELECT THEMAMAP_NM FROM TBD_THEMAMAP WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY THEMAMAP_CL_CODE ASC, THEMAMAP_NM ASC
